workflows.description: Gets items for the specified list.
workflows.name: Get List

arguments.title: Proofpoint Threat Response: Add To List

workflows.description: Adds a member to the specified list.
workflows.name: Add To List

workflows.description: Block the supplied IP Addresses to the specified IP Addresses block list.
workflows.name: Block IP

workflows.description: Block the supplied domains to the specified domains block list.
workflows.name: Block Domain

workflows.description: Block the supplied URLs to the specified URLs block list.
workflows.name: Block URL

arguments.title: Proofpoint Threat Response: Block File Hash

workflows.description: Block the supplied file hashes to the specified file hash block list.
workflows.name: Block File Hash

workflows.description: Get the indicators from the specified list, according to the defined filter.
workflows.name: Search Indicator

workflows.description: Removes an indicator from Proofpoint Threat Response based on the input parameters.
workflows.name: Delete Indicator

workflows.description: Get incident metadata from Threat Response.
workflows.name: Get Incident

workflows.description: Retrieves all incident metadata from Threat Response by specifying filter criteria such as the state of the incident or time of closure.
workflows.name: Get Incidents

arguments.title: Proofpoint Threat Response: Add Comment To Incident

workflows.description: Adds comments to an existing Threat Response incident, by incident ID.
workflows.name: Add Comment To Incident

arguments.title: Proofpoint Threat Response: Update Comment To Incident

workflows.description: Update the comments to an existing Threat Response incident, by incident ID.
workflows.name: Update Comment To Incident

arguments.title: Proofpoint Threat Response: Add User To Incident

workflows.description: Assigns a user to an incident as a target or attacker.
workflows.name: Add User To Incident

workflows.description: Ingest an alert into Threat Response.
workflows.name: Ingest Alert

workflows.description: Close an incident in Proofpoint Threat Response based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Close Incident

workflows.description: Verify if an email has been quarantined.
workflows.name: Verify Quarantine

data.name: Sample - Proofpoint Threat Response - 1.0.0
data.description: Proofpoint Threat Response is a solution designed to help organizations manage and respond to cybersecurity threats. It provides tools and features to identify, investigate, and remediate security incidents.
